alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 07 at 7:51AM CDT until July 11 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and northwest Oklahoma, including the following counties, in central Oklahoma, Kingfisher. In northwest Oklahoma, Blaine. * WHEN...Until 945 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 749 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring in Kingfisher. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Kingfisher is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kingfisher, Okarche and Omega. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
